value.title: Meta Extends Its AI Messaging To The Quest 3 And More At Meta Connect 2023
value.excerpt: Principal Analyst, Mobility & VR, Anshel Sag dives deep on the Quest 3 AR headset, Ray-Ban Meta smart glasses and AI-related news from the Meta Connect 2023 event.

value.title: OpenAI may jump into AI hardware amid high costs, supply constraints

value.title: NVIDIA Powers First GPU-Accelerated 5G Network
value.excerpt: NTT DOCOMO announced the world's first GPU-accelerated commercial Open RAN 5G built on NVIDIA, Fujitsu, and Wind River technology.

value.title: OpenAI is reportedly developing its own chips to combat GPU shortages
value.excerpt: OpenAI, the world's leading artificial intelligence company, has hinted at powering its AI tools with in-house chips to combat the GPU shortage.

value.title: Generative AI Throwdown: Open Source Vs. Proprietary Models
value.excerpt: Generative AI, dominated by proprietary models locked inside big tech companies, is being disrupted by a new wave of open-source models.

value.title: Cramer Says 'Will Not Sell' Nvidia Stock On 'Misinformation' About Microsoft AI Chip
value.excerpt: Cramer shrugged off a report that said Microsoft is prepping to give Nvidia a run for its money with an in-house designed AI chip.

value.title: Samsung accelerates efforts to lead AI chip market
value.excerpt: Samsung Electronics made a series of announcements demonstrating its competitiveness in semiconductor production, as the chip industry expands alongside artificial intelligence (AI) and the emergence of ChatGPT.

value.title: US poised to tighten restrictions on chip equipment exports to China
value.excerpt: A rule aimed at restricting exports of U.S. chipmaking equipment to China is in the final stages of review, suggesting the Biden administration is tightening restrictions on Beijing.

value.title: NVIDIA DGX Cloud Gives CSPs And Their Customers Exactly What They Want: Fast AI, Fast
value.excerpt: While some may confuse this as NVIDIA competing with cloud service providers (CSPs), the DGX Cloud AI is offered in close partnership with CSPs, who love getting revenue without the hassles. And enterprises love access to state-of-the-art hardware and software in their favorite cloud.

value.title: European Commission to keep track of AI and semiconductor chips
value.excerpt: Sources revealed that on October 3, 2023, European Union officials mentioned that they have identified four areas that need assessment regarding technology risk and risk of technology leakage. The areas are believed to include AI, advanced semiconductor technologies, quantum technologies and biotechnologies.

value.title: Lemurian Labs is building a new compute paradigm to reduce cost of running AI models
value.excerpt: Lemurian Labs is an early stage startup with a big ambition to build a software and chip solution to make processing LLMs more efficient.

value.title: Pixel 8 Pro runs Google’s generative AI models on-device
value.excerpt: The newly announced Pixel 8 Pro will be the first hardware to run some of Google's generative AI models on-device.

value.title: Samsung partners with Tenstorrent to produce next-gen AI chips
value.excerpt: Canadian computing startup Tenstorrent has announced that Samsung Electronics, the global leader in chip and smartphone manufacturing will be producing the advanced next-generation AI chipsets for the company.

value.title: Less is a lot more when it comes to AI, says Google's DeepMind
value.excerpt: Neural network AI programs that are reduced by 75% of their functionality can achieve the same power as programs twice their size.

value.title: What AI forgets could kill us, but new research is helping it remember
value.excerpt: A better understanding how the human brain makes memories could help us to reduce neural networks' habit of 'catastrophic' forgetting.

value.title: Microsoft’s ‘top choice’: supply of Nvidia AI GPUs improved but still tight
value.excerpt: He mentioned that the situation regarding GPU supply has improved compared to a few months back, although it is still tight. Previously, the demand for Nvidia’s GPUs for AI and HPC applications exceeded the supply capacity of the entire ecosystem.

value.title: My way or the AI way: Companies approach govt for infra amid GPU scarcity
value.excerpt: GPUs are the highways AI requires. Companies are therefore petitioning the Centre to invest in the vital compute infrastructure so that local startups can compete and win meaningfully in the frenetic global AI race.

value.title: EU examines Nvidia-dominated AI chip market's alleged abuses, Bloomberg reports
value.excerpt: The European Union is examining alleged anticompetitive practices in chips used for artificial intelligence, a market that Nvidia dominates, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.

value.title: AMD CEO Lisa Su on the AI revolution and competing with Nvidia
value.excerpt: At this year’s Code Conference, AMD CEO Lisa Su revealed how the company is using AI in chip design, the future outlook of the GPU business and chip supply chain, and how AMD plans to compete with Nvidia’s H100.
